channel.title: How Do i change a persons stats and items with testscape?
channel.description: I searched it on these forums but the search didnt bring up anything. Well everytime i go to testscape source and go to characters and change the stats and or items of a player, i save, run server and when i log in its as it was before i changed it. How do i change them with them staying?

item.title: How Do i change a persons stats and items with testscape?
item.dc:creator: @haylocks haylocks
item.description:
@haylocks wrote:

I have a .dat editor but how do i remove an item from a persons account?

Read full topic

item.title: How Do i change a persons stats and items with testscape?
item.dc:creator: @ipkyouhaha ipkyouhaha
item.description:
@ipkyouhaha wrote:

changeing the text does nothing for testscape…you need to item spawn ingame for items, and for changing lvls/xp you need to either use the ::setxp command or make a command in your cleint (note: the setxp command is set on player lvl 2 and higher unless you change it)

Read full topic
